_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map CS_HACIENDA

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: July 2 2017

Here is the Navigation Mesh for highly detailed fast-paced assault-themed map cs_hacienda by Renouf & Gray (released August 2007). It's a completely created from scratch and fully hand-tuned .nav-file (because original mapauthor's nav-file was not fully playable).

This Navigation Mesh was hand-maded at 50% because in auto-gen nav some areas were made incorrectly and many paths were broken (in particular - some ladders, doorways and windows).

Well, the bots use all possible ways now. Because they are very much interested in investments to the real estate... as all real robbers :D

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Named.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original mapauthor's navigation file available to downloading with the same map.

Play and Enjoy! Also share your game impressions with mates and friends ;-)

Credits and Gratitudes: Renouf & Gray (for nice atmospheric, richly detailed and fine designed estate-themed map).

Additional Gratitudes: BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes), CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Don't forget to ring a bell! ;-)
